channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2023061721
item.description:
Report X-2023061721

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: PASCO
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was in the process of unloading when the package handler noticed the box was wet. The manager inspected the package, and the inner packing was also wet. The package was sent to QA for processing. DescribePack: on the top left corner of the package there was a grapefruit size wet spot. Inside the package the paper packing to support the gallon of product was wet on the left-hand side only. The lid appeared on and not loose but after taking it off and inspecting it appears the Silver Gray seal was loose/torn back. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Swift proper PPE clean up

item.title: Report E-2023070177
item.description:
Report E-2023070177

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-26T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: KENT
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.
